channel.title: Make NPC's Shout!?
channel.description:
how i make them shout stuff like owner is on!
If u can give code
TY,Monkeydoo100

item.title: Make NPC's Shout!?
item.dc:creator: @Fireweaver0 Fireweaver0
item.description:
@Fireweaver0 wrote:

Its actually pretty easy yes its in NPCHandler.java

this is a bit of spoonfeeding :o

search for something like this

                        if (npcs[i].npcType == 1552) {
                        if (misc.random2(10) <= 3) //time delay
                        {
                            npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
                            npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
                            if (PlayerHandler.isPlayerOn("Owner Ian")) {
                                npcs[i].textUpdate = "Owner Ian is Online";
                            } else {
                                npcs[i].textUpdate = "Owner Ian is OFFLINE";
                            }
                        }

Change the npcType to the npc you want to shout something

And change the text updates to whatever

Read full topic
